00110

00113         
00114 private:
00115         
00116         Double32_t fQvalue; //calculation based upon event category (heat, fiducial, surface, etc...)
00117         Double32_t fEnergyRecoil; //calculation based upon event category
00118         Double32_t fEnergyIon; //calculation based upon event category.
00119         Double32_t fEnergyHeat; //independent of event category. based upon the heat pulse height.
00120         
00121         Int_t fEventFlag;  //0 = noise, 1 = heat only, 2 = fiducial, 3 = surface, 4 = pure guard, 5 = other.. calculated by ERA
00122         Int_t fChi2Flag; //set to 1 if the chi2 of all relevant channesl is okay (different from cuts.CutChi2)
00123         Int_t fIonFlags[kSizeOfIonFlags]; //each integer in this array corresponds to a particular ion channel (collectrode 1, 2, veto 1, 2, and guard 1, 2). When the value is set to one, there was a pulse seen on that channel by ERA.
00124         Int_t fTriggerBit1; //Samba's Liste1 event trigger bit map
00125         Int_t fTriggerBit2; //Samba's Liste2 event trigger bit map
00126         Int_t fVoltageFlag; //Set to one if the polarity on this bolometer is reveresed. 
00127         Int_t fIonPulseTimeOffset; //the time offset of the peak of the ion pulse relative to the peak of the heat pulse, in units of stamp (10 microseonds)
00128         
00129         Double_t fFiducialVolume;  //the value of the fiducial volume, in grams, for this detector.
00130         
00131         TRef fSambaRecord;  //points to the samba record associated with this event.
00132         
00133         //adding data from eion, eheat and cuts files from the ERA output
00134         //many of these values might want to be stored in boloPulse Sub record
00135         //at a later time. This is where they should be, logically. But, given
00136         //the need for analysis now, we put these data here without thinking about it
00137         //the FID detectors, for example, do not have a guard channel. 
00138         
00139         //eion
00140         Double32_t fEnergyCollectrode[2];  //energy of pulse on the two collectrodes (or fiducial electrodes)
00141         Double32_t fEnergyVeto[2]; //energy of pulse on the two veto electrodes
00142         Double32_t fEnergyGuard[2]; //energy of pulse on the two guard channels.
00143         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineCollectrode[2];  //fitted value of the energy along the baseline (at "zero time") on each collectrode
00144         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineVeto[2]; //fitted value of the energy along the baseline at zero time on each veto electrode
00145         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineGuard[2]; //fitted value of the energy along the baseline at zero time on each guard channel
00146         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseCollectrode[2]; //baseline noise amplitude on the collectrodes (in what units...)
00147         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseVeto[2]; //baseline noise amplitude on the veto channels
00148         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseGuard[2]; //baseline noise amplitude on the guard channels
00149         Double32_t fEnergyIonFiducial;  //energy of the fiducial signal (the weighted average of the fEnergyCollectrode)
00150         Double32_t fEnergyIonSum; //the sum of energy on all ionization channels that have a signal (calucaled by ERA)
00151         Double32_t fBaselineIonFiducial; //baseline noise amplitude of the fiducial signal (the weighted average of the fEnergyCollectrode)
00152         //Double_t fPolarFlag;  //same as fVoltageFlag. 
00153         
00154         //eheat
00155         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineHeat; //fitted value of the energy along the baseline (at "zero time") on the heat channel
00156         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseHeat; //baseline noise amplitude of the heat signal. Call GetBaselineNoiseHeat() to get this value.
00157         
00158         //cuts
00159         TBits fCuts;  //set the TestCutsBitNumber method for a list of which bit corresponds to which cut.
00160         
00161         //TRefArray fHLAPulseSubRecords; //an array of the HLA PulseSub Records associated with this bolo record
00162         //TRefArray fRawPulseSubRecords; //an array of the Raw PulseSub Records associated with this bolo record
00163         
00164         //private methods
00165         void InitializeMembers(void);
00166         void CopyLocalMembers(const KHLABolometerRecord &aRec);
00167         
00168   ClassDef(KHLABolometerRecord,1);
00169 };
